verbs.description: aurora games to [V: bring] [ARG1: elite female athletes] [ARG2: to albany] [ARGM-TMP: in 2019] elite female athletes from the united states and around the world will come to albany in august 2019 to compete in the inaugural aurora games the event creator and executive producer jerry solomon is announcing monday at a 12 15 p m news conference at the times union center one of the venues for the contest solomon a sports manager and entertainment producer touts the week - long games scheduled for aug 20 - 25 2019 as a showcase for the best in women sports entertainment and culture and an opportunity for women to have the spotlight on them only producer jackie joyner kersee united states michael phelps bob belber times union center international women day nancy kerrigan albany international womens day usain bolt times union travers stakes capital region jerry solomon south america albany capital center albany new york aurora games executive producer
